settings.title: we’re sorry
settings.heading: We’re sorry
settings.lead_graph:
This offer is only available on nothing.tech, and not with any of our partner stores. We apologise for any inconvenience.

This means it can't be redeemed if nothing.tech doesn't deliver to your country yet.

Please use our store locator to find out where to buy Ear (stick) in your location.

settings.title: DISCOUNT
settings.heading: Thank you.
settings.lead_paragraph:
As the Nothing ecosystem expands, we wanted to say thank you to those that have believed in us since the beginning.

So if you currently own a Nothing product or you’re one of our community Black Dot holders, we’re giving you an exclusive 10% discount code for Ear (stick).

Your opportunity to experience our most advanced audio product yet, for less.

Sign up or login to your Nothing account to get started.
settings.enter_text: Please enter your Phone (1) IMEI by going to Settings > About phone or your Ear (1) SN. Found on the box below the bar code or engraved on the metallic closure of the case lid.
settings.error_text: Unfortunately, the information you provided has not been recognised. Please double check and try again.
settings.code_used_text: The product details or user information has already been used to redeem a discount code. Please double check and try again.
settings.shop_now_text: Enter at checkout when you buy Ear (stick) to redeem. SHOP NOW

settings.heading: Which countries are participating in the offer?
settings.text: Australia, Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Canada, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, United Kingdom, United States.

settings.heading: Details
settings.text:
1 discount per device and 1 per Black Dot holder.

If you have multiple Nothing products, or are both a Black Dot holder and a Nothing product owner, you can share your extra discount code(s) with a friend. If you have the same device in 2 colours, this counts as 2 separate devices (and gives you 2 codes).

settings.question: Where can I find my IMEI or serial number?
settings.answer: For Ear (1), the serial number can be found on the box just below the bar code or engraved on the metallic closure of the case lid. For Phone (1), head to Settings>About phone.

settings.question: How do I redeem the discount?
settings.answer: Once your IMEI or SN has been confirmed, a code will appear on the screen on the Nothing website. Copy this code and enter it at checkout when making your Ear (stick) order.

settings.question: How long is my code valid for?
settings.answer: Your code is valid from 4 November 2022 to 30 November 2022.

settings.question: How many codes can I get?
settings.answer: One per device, one per Black Dot holder email address. So if you have multiple devices, you will have the same amount in discount codes. If you have multiple Black dots, you will only receive one email, and one code.

settings.question: I live in a country where I am unable to purchase directly from nothing.tech. Why can't I enjoy the 10% off?
settings.answer: Currently, the 10% discount is only available on nothing.tech. We are encouraging our partners to offer the same but it’s at their discretion. We recommend you check your local retailers for additional promotions. Apologies for the inconvenience.

settings.question: Which countries are participating in the promotion?
settings.answer: Australia, Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Canada, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, United Kingdom, United States.

settings.question: I didn’t purchase my Nothing products from nothing.tech. Can I still get the discount?
settings.answer: Yes, as long as you have your IMEI or SN number.

settings.question: Can I still get my 10% discount if I’ve pre-ordered Ear (stick)?
settings.answer: Yes, if you own a Nothing product or are a Black Dot holder and have already pre-ordered Ear (stick) for £99, we will refund you 10%. Just contact our Customer Service from 4 November with your order number and IMEI or SN number ready. Or your Black Dot holder email.

settings.question: Can I use multiple codes for the same purchase?
settings.answer: No, you can only use one code per purchase.

settings.question: The IMEI/SN/email address is not recognised. What do I do now?
settings.answer: Double check the IMEI/SN/email address. Check your devices for the correct SN or IMEI number. For Black Dot holders, please double check the correct email address is registered with Nothing.

settings.question: It says the IMEI/SN/email address has already been used, but I haven’t used it yet. What do I do now?
The 10% discount didn’t not reflect on the final payment at checkout. What do I do now?
settings.answer: Make sure you’ve entered the correct discount code at checkout. If you are trying to enter after you’ve purchased Ear (stick), you will have to buy it again.

settings.question: If I buy Phone (1) and Ear (stick) together during the pre-order, will they arrive at the same time?
settings.answer: Yes, they will arrive together and be delivered on or after 4 November.

settings.question: I did not get a confirmation of my order. What do I do now?

settings.title: Thank you
settings.heading: Thank you
settings.lead_graph:
The loyalty discount on Ear (stick) has now finished. Thank you once again for your ongoing support. 

Stay tuned for more exclusive rewards in the future.
